snippet: The American secretary of state, helping to mark 20 years since the normalization of relations, was in Hanoi to discuss trade and security issues.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry emphasizes importance of improving human rights in speech to Vietnamese officials and entrepreneurs on 20th anniversary of restoration of diplomatic ties between America and Vietnam.
lead_paragraph: The American secretary of state, helping to mark 20 years since the normalization of relations, was in Hanoi to discuss trade and security issues.

headline.main: Kerry Tells Vietnam That U.S. Ties Will Deepen if Human Rights Are Protected
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Vietnam: Progress on Human Rights Will Deepen Ties With U.S., Kerry Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
